original_title: Everybody Needs A Place To Go: An Evening With Panic! At The Disco
overview: Panic! At The Disco has partnered with Moment to bring the band's Viva Las Vengeance tour directly to you. Performing songs from their latest album as well as the band's greatest hits, it's an event you won't want to miss!
title: Everybody Needs A Place To Go: An Evening With Panic! At The Disco
